org.apache.hadoop.fs

类 TrashPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.TrashPolicy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Configurable

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public abstract class TrashPolicy
extends Configured
    This interface is used for implementing different Trash policies. Provides factory method to create instances of the configured Trash policy.

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void createCheckpoint()
      Create a trash checkpoint.
      abstract void deleteCheckpoint()
      Delete old trash checkpoint(s).
      abstract Path getCurrentTrashDir()
      Get the current working directory of the Trash Policy This API does not work with files deleted from encryption zone when HDFS data encryption at rest feature is enabled as rename file between encryption zones or encryption zone and non-encryption zone is not allowed.
      Path getCurrentTrashDir(Path path)
      Get the current trash directory for path specified based on the Trash Policy
      abstract Runnable getEmptier()
      Return a Runnable that periodically empties the trash of all users, intended to be run by the superuser.
      static TrashPolicy getInstance(Configuration conf, FileSystem fs)
      Get an instance of the configured TrashPolicy based on the value of the configuration parameter fs.trash.classname.
      static TrashPolicy getInstance(Configuration conf, FileSystem fs, Path home)
      已过时。 
      Use getInstance(Configuration, FileSystem) instead.
      void initialize(Configuration conf, FileSystem fs)
      Used to setup the trash policy.
      abstract void initialize(Configuration conf, FileSystem fs, Path home)
      已过时。 
      Use initialize(Configuration, FileSystem) instead.
      abstract boolean isEnabled()
      Returns whether the Trash Policy is enabled for this filesystem.
      abstract boolean moveToTrash(Path path)
      Move a file or directory to the current trash directory.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public abstract void initialize(Configuration conf,
                                            FileSystem fs,
                                            Path home)
        已过时。 Use initialize(Configuration, FileSystem) instead.
        Used to setup the trash policy. Must be implemented by all TrashPolicy implementations.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration to be used
        fs - the filesystem to be used
        home - the home directory

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Configuration conf,
                       FileSystem fs)
        Used to setup the trash policy. Must be implemented by all TrashPolicy implementations. Different from initialize(conf, fs, home), this one does not assume trash always under /user/$USER due to HDFS encryption zone.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration to be used
        fs - the filesystem to be used

      • isEnabled

        public abstract boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether the Trash Policy is enabled for this filesystem.

      • moveToTrash

        public abstract boolean moveToTrash(Path path)
                             throws IOException
        Move a file or directory to the current trash directory.
        返回:
        false if the item is already in the trash or trash is disabled
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createCheckpoint

        public abstract void createCheckpoint()
                               throws IOException
        Create a trash checkpoint.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • deleteCheckpoint

        public abstract void deleteCheckpoint()
                               throws IOException
        Delete old trash checkpoint(s).
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getCurrentTrashDir

        public abstract Path getCurrentTrashDir()
        Get the current working directory of the Trash Policy This API does not work with files deleted from encryption zone when HDFS data encryption at rest feature is enabled as rename file between encryption zones or encryption zone and non-encryption zone is not allowed. The caller is recommend to use the new API TrashPolicy#getCurrentTrashDir(Path path). It returns the trash location correctly for the path specified no matter the path is in encryption zone or not.

      • getCurrentTrashDir

        public Path getCurrentTrashDir(Path path)
                        throws IOException
        Get the current trash directory for path specified based on the Trash Policy
        参数:
        path - path to be deleted
        返回:
        current trash directory for the path to be deleted
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getEmptier

        public abstract Runnable getEmptier()
                             throws IOException
        Return a Runnable that periodically empties the trash of all users, intended to be run by the superuser.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getInstance

        @Deprecated
public static TrashPolicy getInstance(Configuration conf,
                                                  FileSystem fs,
                                                  Path home)
        已过时。 Use getInstance(Configuration, FileSystem) instead.
        Get an instance of the configured TrashPolicy based on the value of the configuration parameter fs.trash.classname.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration to be used
        fs - the file system to be used
        home - the home directory
        返回:
        an instance of TrashPolicy

      • getInstance

        public static TrashPolicy getInstance(Configuration conf,
                                      FileSystem fs)
        Get an instance of the configured TrashPolicy based on the value of the configuration parameter fs.trash.classname.
        参数:
        conf - the configuration to be used
        fs - the file system to be used
        返回:
        an instance of TrashPolicy
